title: Laird Of Her Heart
description: LAIRD OF HER HEART Book 1 in the Dundragon Time Travel Trilogy By Sabrina York  When Maggie Spencer is mysteriously transported to the Scotland of her ancestors, she is stunned to come face to face with him. Dominic Dundragon, the man she’s been half in love with her whole life. A man who’s been dead for 700 years.  They both have enemies aplenty. Will she have a chance to win his love, or will this adventure end in disaster?
author: Sabrina York
